name: HashKey Group
fullText:
📢 HashKey Group Weekly Digest
Here’s what’s happening across the #HashKey ecosystem this week 👇

🔹 @HashKeyGroup
DAAMC Inaugural Seminar Recap — “On-Chain Compliance, the Cornerstone of Trust: A New Era of Stablecoin AML in Hong Kong”.

Organised with @RD_Technologies, https://t.co/kPoZrN27tl

name: HashKey Group
fullText:
🌟 Excited to welcome Emma Shi, Head of OTC at HashKey Group — leading sales trading and operations at the OTC desk.

Emma brings 6+ years of experience managing OTC trading desks across top crypto exchanges and quant firms. She was a founding member of Binance’s OTC trading team https://t.co/YU89C7gxv6

name: HashKey Group
fullText:
🌟 Honored to welcome Dr. Xiao Feng, Chairman & CEO of HashKey Group — a leading digital asset financial services group in Asia with global operations.

Dr. Xiao is also Vice Chairman of Wanxiang Holding & Chairman of Wanxiang Blockchain. With 30+ years in China’s securities & https://t.co/P2nEGmuLxm
